channel.title: Magic on Serendephia
channel.description: Recent content in Magic on Serendephia

item.title: The magic of Serendiphia…
item.description: The magic of Serendiphia… Serendiphia comes from the word Serendipity whose meaning catches us with that touch of mystery and surprise. It is charged with positive energy and stealthily emerges in our lives to show us something that we did not see but that we appreciate for the well-being and fascination that it transmits to us. Undoubtedly, serendipities are gifts that come at the right time so as not to leave us indifferent.
